description:
The Saint Disciple of the third seat, known as "the  Incessant Tempest" She rose through the ranks from an Imperial soldier to a Saint Disciple. She`s laid back and frank, but is aggressive toward the witches and demons of the Sovereignty and shows no mercy. Her physique is immensely strong, and her dynamic visual acuity is superhuman.
Source: Official page
name: Mei
